author: adrianc
msg: Eliminated redundant code in the new widget classes. ModelSingleForm and ModelGrid are effectively light-weight "decorators" for the ModelForm abstract class. ModelForm still retains code for all form types (single and list) - because any attempt to separate the functionality will result in an avalanche of code modifications.

author: jleroux
msg: Keeps in sync with OFBiz trunk HEAD

author: rhuijben
msg: In ra_serf, refactor the get_file() implementation to collect its special
properties directly instead of via an intermediate 'generic hash'.
(svn_ra_serf__get_file): Avoid the far too generic node prop functions.

author: batkinson
msg: Removed fix for CONTINUUM-2723, latest struts includes it.

author: batkinson
msg: Reverting to default params interceptor, latest struts now handles excludes.
